verbose_text: XREF_BIBR XREF_BIBR Zhu et al also found in flow experiments where FXI antibodies 14E11 or O1A6 were added to blood of healthy individuals efficiently abolished thrombin and fibrin generation without affecting platelet deposition on the collagen surface.
evidence: FXI antibodies 14E11 or O1A6 were added to blood of healthy individuals efficiently abolished thrombin
